Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The URI to the alert.
Columns.Name: ReferenceURI

Columns.Description: The name of the cluster the alert came from.
Columns.Name: ClusterName

Columns.Description: The component that generated the alert.
Columns.Name: ComponentName

Columns.Description: Id of the alert definition.
Columns.Name: DefinitionId

Columns.Description: Name of the alert definition
Columns.Name: DefinitionName

Columns.Description: The firmness of the alert.
Columns.Name: AlertFirmness

Columns.Description: The FQDN of the host where the alert was generated.
Columns.Name: HostFQDN

Columns.Description: The name of the host where the alert was generated.
Columns.Name: HostName

Columns.Description: The ID of the alert message.
Columns.Name: AlertID

Columns.Description: Instance number of the alert.
Columns.Name: AlertInstance

Columns.Description: The label of the alert.
Columns.Name: Label

Columns.Description: The latest time the alert occurred.
Columns.Name: LatestTimestamp

Columns.Description: The timestamp the alert first occurred.
Columns.Name: OriginalTimestamp

Columns.Description: The maintenance classifaction state of the alert.
Columns.Name: MaintenanceState

Columns.Description: The number of times an alert has occurred.
Columns.Name: Occurences

Columns.Description: The total number of occurences an alert can have before being escalated.
Columns.Name: RepeatTolerance

Columns.Description: The amount of occurences left before an alert gets escalted.
Columns.Name: RepeatToleranceRemaining

Columns.Description: The scope of the alert.
Columns.Name: Scope

Columns.Description: The name of the service that generated the alert.
Columns.Name: ServiceName

Columns.Description: The state of the alert.
Columns.Name: State

Columns.Description: The informational text of the alert.
Columns.Name: Text

Columns.Description: The type of cluster where the alert was generated.
Columns.Name: ClusterType

Columns.Description: The name of the table
